Posts.Content: LisaThompson wrote: Mom has a fast growing breast cancer.  She doesn't have surgery until Wednesday of next week, March 21, 2012.  I wish they can get her in sooner than that.  If a cancerous tumor is fast growing, high grade, can it grow bigger within a week? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Can canerous tumor grow within a week LisaThompson Kicks
